name: farigiraf

abilities.name: cud-chew
abilities.description: When the Pokémon eats a Berry, it will regurgitate that Berry at the end of the next turn and eat it one more time.

abilities.name: armor-tail
abilities.description: The mysterious tail covering the Pokémon's head makes opponents unable to use priority moves against the Pokémon or its allies.

abilities.name: sap-sipper
abilities.description: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.

description: Now that the brain waves from the head and tail are synced up, the psychic power of this Pokémon is 10 times stronger than Girafarig’s.
